title: All Avenqor courses.
subtitle: Structured PDFs for Forex, Crypto and Binary options. Choose by level and market – every course keeps risk and process at the center, not hype.

meta.paymentInfo: Pay with tokens or directly in EUR, GBP, USD or AED.

empty.title: No courses match your filters yet.
empty.description: Try resetting one of the filters or clearing the search field. New content is added regularly as our curriculum expands.

educationOnly.title: Education only · no signals
educationOnly.description: All courses are designed to explain concepts, structure and risk management. They never contain trade signals or promises of performance.

customCourse.title: Prefer a tailored path?
customCourse.description: If none of the ready-made courses fully match your context, you can request a custom PDF built around your experience, deposit size and risk tolerance.

aiStrategy.title: Short on time today?
aiStrategy.description: Use the AI Strategy Builder to get a focused, instantly generated plan, then come back to full courses when you are ready to go deeper.

pricing.paymentNote: You can use existing balance or add tokens at checkout. Card payments support EUR, GBP, USD and AED.
pricing.educationDisclaimer: Education only. This course does not contain trading signals or promises of performance.
pricing.riskNote1: Trading Forex is high risk and may lead to total loss of capital.
pricing.riskNote2: By continuing, you confirm you have read the risk disclaimer.

outline.title: Course outline
outline.description: A sequence of modules that build on each other so you are not jumping between random concepts.

notFor.title: What this course will not do

customCourse.description: If you want a course built specifically around your experience, deposit and risk tolerance, you can request a custom PDF prepared within 48–96 hours.

aiStrategy.description: Already comfortable with the basics? Use the AI Strategy Builder to generate a focused, educational plan based on your profile, then apply it on top of what you learn here.

riskReminder.title: High-risk market reminder
riskReminder.description: Trading Forex is highly speculative. Never risk money you cannot afford to lose. This course explains concepts and processes only – it does not make decisions for you.

faq.title: Questions about this course
faq.description: Quick answers to how it works, what you receive and how to use it.

receivePdf.question: How do I receive the PDF?
receivePdf.answer: Immediately after successful payment, the course is added to your Avenqor library and a download link is sent to your email.

refund.question: Can I get a refund if I do not like it?
refund.answer: As this is digital educational content delivered instantly, refunds are typically not offered. Please review the course description, outline and risk notice before purchasing.

signals.question: Does this course tell me exactly when to buy or sell?
signals.answer: No. This course focuses on understanding, structure and risk management. It does not provide trade signals or exact entries/exits.

cta.title: Ready to start with {courseTitle}?
cta.description: Take this course first, then layer AI strategies or custom PDFs on top as your understanding grows.
